body_html:
@1zb
I try this, but it say that required arguement bias is missing despite it being present. Do you know what the problem could be?

## arguments: kH, kW, strideH, strideW, padH, padW, inH, inW, outH, outW
local=torch.nn.backends.thnn.backend.SpatialConvolutionLocal(3, 3, 1, 1, 0, 0, 32, 32, 30, 30)
outputs=local(inputs, weight, bias) # N x outC x outH x outW

body:
@1zb 
I try this, but it say that required arguement bias is missing despite it being present. Do you know what the problem could be?

```
## arguments: kH, kW, strideH, strideW, padH, padW, inH, inW, outH, outW
local=torch.nn.backends.thnn.backend.SpatialConvolutionLocal(3, 3, 1, 1, 0, 0, 32, 32, 30, 30)
outputs=local(inputs, weight, bias) # N x outC x outH x outW
```
